description: Ten years after his original massacre, the invalid Michael Myers awakens on Halloween Eve and returns to Haddonfield to kill his seven-year-old niece. Can Dr. Loomis stop him?
keywords: serial killer,halloween,small town,masked villain,michael myers character
name: Halloween 4: The Return of Michael Myers

original_info.id: Halloween 4: The Return of Michael Myers_1988
original_info.name: Halloween 4: The Return of Michael Myers

review.name: As a Halloween slasher, it delivers the goods...
review.reviewBody:
The Michael Meyers figure in the mask is more sinister than ever in this better than average remake of the original HALLOWEEN movie. It's a slasher that has enough real thrills for anyone who wants to see the gore and many plot twists and turns.

DONALD PLEASANCE is still Dr. Loomis, alerting the police that Meyers has escaped and is back in Haddonfield looking to murder his niece, DANIELLE HARRIS. Harris is a wonderful child actress who looks genuinely frightened throughout the story and convincingly goes through the paces, as do all the other members of an excellent cast. ELLIE CORNELL and SASHA JENSON do well as the conventional teen-aged leads.

If slasher films of this genre are your thing, this is a better script than you might expect from this franchise.

On the other hand, if you've seen the original film with Jamie Lee Curtis, there's an awful lot of familiarity in the plot line. But as a Halloween slasher, it delivers the goods. 

Summing up: Probably one of the best sequels in this series.
